section.p: The Operative Note Fluids section may be used to record fluids administered during the surgical procedure.

ol.li: SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1) (CONF:9914, CONF:10047)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.1.1 SurgicalOperationNoteDocumentTypeCode DYNAMIC (CONF:8484)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] documentationOf (CONF:8486)
Such documentationOfs SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:8493)
This serviceEvent Contains zero or one [0..1] performer
The performer represents clinicians who actually and principally carry out the serviceEvent. Typically, these are clinicians who have surgical privileges in their institutions such as Surgeons, Obstetrician/Gynecologists, and Family Practice Physicians. The performer may also be Nonphysician Providers (NPP) who have surgical privileges. There may be more than one primary performer in the case of complicated surgeries. There are occasionally co-surgeons. Usually they will be billing separately and will each dictate their own notes. An example may be spinal surgery , where a general surgeon and an orthopaedic surgeon both are present and billing off the same Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) codes. Typically two Operative Notes are generated; however, each will list the other as a co-surgeon.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:8495)
This performer SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.4 ProviderType DYNAMIC (CONF:8522, CONF:8523)
The performer represents clinicians who actually and principally carry out the serviceEvent. Typically, these are clinicians who have surgical privileges in their institutions such as Surgeons, Obstetrician/Gynecologists, and Family Practice Physicians. The performer may also be Nonphysician Providers (NPP) who have surgical privileges. There may be more than one primary performer in the case of complicated surgeries. There are occasionally co-surgeons. Usually they will be billing separately and will each dictate their own notes. An example may be spinal surgery , where a general surgeon and an orthopaedic surgeon both are present and billing off the same Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) codes. Typically two Operative Notes are generated; however, each will list the other as a co-surgeon.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (i., CONF:8487)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8494)
This serviceEvent i. The value of Clinical Document /documentationOf/serviceEvent/code SHALL be from ICD9 CM Procedures (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.104), CPT-4 (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), or values descending from 71388002 (Procedure) from the SNOMED CT (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) ValueSet Procedure 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.28 DYNAMIC. (CONF:8487)
This serviceEvent The serviceEvent/effectiveTime SHALL be present with effectiveTime/low (CONF:8488)
This serviceEvent If a width is not present, the serviceEvent/effectiveTime SHALL include effectiveTime/high. (CONF:10058)
This serviceEvent When only the date and the length of the procedure are known a width element SHALL be present and the serviceEvent/effectiveTime/high SHALL not be present. (CONF:10060)
This serviceEvent Any assistants SHALL be identified and SHALL be identified as secondary performers (SPRF)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] anesthesiaSection (CONF:9883)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Anesthesia Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.25)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] complicationsSection (CONF:9885)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Complications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] postoperativeDiagnosisSection (CONF:9913)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Postoperative Diagnosis Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.35)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] preoperativeDiagnosisSection (CONF:9888)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Preoperative Diagnosis Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.34)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureEstimatedBloodLossSection (CONF:9890)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Estimated Blood Loss Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.18.2.9)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureFindingsSection (CONF:9892)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Findings Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureSpecimensTakenSection (CONF:9894)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Specimens Taken Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.31)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureDescriptionSection (CONF:9896)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Description Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] procedureImplantsSection (CONF:9898)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Implants Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.40)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] operativeNoteFluidSection (CONF:9900)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Operative Note Fluid Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.12)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] operativeNoteSurgicalProcedureSection (CONF:9902)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Operative Note Surgical Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.14)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] planOfCareSection (CONF:9904)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plan Of Care Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] plannedProcedureSection (CONF:9906)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] procedureDispositionSection (CONF:9908)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Disposition Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.18.2.12)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] procedureIndicationsSection (CONF:9910)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Indications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] surgicalDrainsSection (CONF:9912)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Surgical Drains Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.13)
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:5249)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.1.1 SurgicalOperationNoteDocumentTypeCode DYNAMIC (CONF:8484)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind STATIC (CONF:5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 Language DYNAMIC (CONF:5372)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:5266)
The recordTarget records the patient whose health information is described by the clinical document; it must contain at least one patientRole element.
Such recordTargets SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole (CONF:5268)
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5271)
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268)
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280)
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient (CONF:5283)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) DYNAMIC (CONF:6394)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime
This patient SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.15836 HITSP Ethnicity Value Set STATIC
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 HL7 Marital Status STATIC 1
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5284)
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] raceCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 Race STATIC 1
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 HL7 Religious Affiliation STATIC 1
This patient MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian (CONF:5325)
Such guardians SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr
Such guardians SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 Personal Relationship Role Type STATIC 1
Such guardians MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom
Such guardians SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] guardianPerson (CONF:5385)
This guardianPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthplace (CONF:5395)
This birthplace SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] place (CONF:5396)
This place SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:5397)
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] languageCommunication (CONF:5406)
This languageCommunication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 Language DYNAMIC (CONF:5407)
This languageCommunication MAY contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:5414)
This languageCommunication SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] proficiencyLevelCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12199 LanguageAbilityProficiency STATIC
This languageCommunication MAY contain zero or one [0..1] modeCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 HL7 LanguageAbilityMode STATIC 1
This patient SHALL satisfy: BirthTime precise to year
This patient SHOULD satisfy: BirthTime precise to day
This patientRole Contains zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419)
This providerOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420)
This providerOrganization The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996) (CONF:9996)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf (CONF:9955)
This componentOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter (CONF:9956)
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9958)
This encompassingEncounter SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9959)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:5444)
Such authors Contains exactly one [1..1] time
Such authors SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:5448)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5452)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5449)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5428)
This assignedAuthor Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This assignedAuthor Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice
This assignedAuthoringDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:9936)
This assignedAuthoringDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:9999)
This assignedAuthor This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice
This assignedAuthor The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:5441)
This dataEnterer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:5442)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5460)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9944)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5443)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5466)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:5469)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This assignedEntity id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9943)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (iv., CONF:5519)
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian (CONF:5520)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] representedCustodianOrganization (CONF:5521)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5559)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5524)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:5525)
This representedCustodianOrganization The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:5565)
Such informationRecipients SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] intendedRecipient (CONF:5566)
This intendedRecipient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informationRecipient (CONF:5568)
This informationRecipient SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This intendedRecipient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] receivedOrganization (CONF:5577)
This receivedOrganization SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:5578)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:5579)
This legalAuthenticator SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5580)
This legalAuthenticator SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5583, CONF:5584)
This legalAuthenticator Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:5597)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:5607)
Such authenticators SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5608)
Such authenticators SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature)
Such authenticators SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity (CONF:5612)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5616)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5613)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5622)
This assignedEntity Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:8001)
This informant Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] id (a., CONF:9945)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson (CONF:8221)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996)
This informant Contains zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity
This relatedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] relatedPerson (CONF:8221)
This relatedPerson SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
This informant SHALL satisfy: contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity OR exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:8002)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:10003)
Such participants MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:10004)
Such participants Such participants, if present, SHALL have an associatedPerson or scopingOrganization element under participant/associatedEntity.
Such participants Unless otherwise specified by the document specific header constraints, when participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 STATIC 2011-09-30.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:9952)
Such inFulfillmentOfs SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order (CONF:9953)
This order SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9954)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] documentationOf (CONF:8486)
Such documentationOfs SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:8493)
This serviceEvent Contains zero or one [0..1] performer
The performer represents clinicians who actually and principally carry out the serviceEvent. Typically, these are clinicians who have surgical privileges in their institutions such as Surgeons, Obstetrician/Gynecologists, and Family Practice Physicians. The performer may also be Nonphysician Providers (NPP) who have surgical privileges. There may be more than one primary performer in the case of complicated surgeries. There are occasionally co-surgeons. Usually they will be billing separately and will each dictate their own notes. An example may be spinal surgery , where a general surgeon and an orthopaedic surgeon both are present and billing off the same Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) codes. Typically two Operative Notes are generated; however, each will list the other as a co-surgeon.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:8495)
This performer SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.4 ProviderType DYNAMIC (CONF:8522, CONF:8523)
The performer represents clinicians who actually and principally carry out the serviceEvent. Typically, these are clinicians who have surgical privileges in their institutions such as Surgeons, Obstetrician/Gynecologists, and Family Practice Physicians. The performer may also be Nonphysician Providers (NPP) who have surgical privileges. There may be more than one primary performer in the case of complicated surgeries. There are occasionally co-surgeons. Usually they will be billing separately and will each dictate their own notes. An example may be spinal surgery , where a general surgeon and an orthopaedic surgeon both are present and billing off the same Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) codes. Typically two Operative Notes are generated; however, each will list the other as a co-surgeon.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (i., CONF:8487)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8494)
This serviceEvent i. The value of Clinical Document /documentationOf/serviceEvent/code SHALL be from ICD9 CM Procedures (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.104), CPT-4 (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), or values descending from 71388002 (Procedure) from the SNOMED CT (CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) ValueSet Procedure 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.28 DYNAMIC. (CONF:8487)
This serviceEvent The serviceEvent/effectiveTime SHALL be present with effectiveTime/low (CONF:8488)
This serviceEvent If a width is not present, the serviceEvent/effectiveTime SHALL include effectiveTime/high. (CONF:10058)
This serviceEvent When only the date and the length of the procedure are known a width element SHALL be present and the serviceEvent/effectiveTime/high SHALL not be present. (CONF:10060)
This serviceEvent Any assistants SHALL be identified and SHALL be identified as secondary performers (SPRF)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Anesthesia Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.25)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Complications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Estimated Blood Loss Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.18.2.9)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureFindingsSection (CONF:9892)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Findings Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Specimens Taken Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.31)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedureDescriptionSection (CONF:9896)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Description Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] procedureImplantsSection (CONF:9898)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Implants Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.40)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Operative Note Fluid Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.12)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Operative Note Surgical Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.14)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] planOfCareSection (CONF:9904)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plan Of Care Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] plannedProcedureSection (CONF:9906)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.30)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Disposition Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.18.2.12)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Indications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.29)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Surgical Drains Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.13)
SHALL satisfy: The US Realm Clinical Document Address datatype flavor is used by US Realm Clinical Document Header for the patient or any other person or organization mentioned within it.

SHALL satisfy: The US Realm Clinical Document Date and Time datatype flavor records date and time information. If no time zone offset is provided, you can make no assumption about time, unless you have made a local exchange agreement. This data type uses the same rules as US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED), but is used with the effectiveTime element.

SHALL satisfy: The US Realm Patient Name datatype flavor is a set of reusable constraints that can be used for the patient or any other person. It requires a first (given) and last (family) name. If a patient or person has only one name part (e.g., patient with first name only) place the name part in the field required by the organization. Use the appropriate nullFlavor, "Not Applicable" (NA), in the other field.

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <realmCode code="US"/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.7"/> <id root="1162130089"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <title/> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.25" codeSystemName="ConfidentialityCode"/> <languageCode/> <setId root="f81e5603-ccf0-474a-a272-661ad0d9789b"/> <versionNumber value="1"/> <recordTarget> <realmCode/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <patientRole/> </recordTarget> <author> <realmCode/>
